constraints.name: tree_structure
constraints.description: 输入数据构成一棵树，根节点为1

constraints.name: subtree_product
constraints.description: 每个子树的得分是该子树内所有射中靶子分数的乘积

constraints.name: probability_constraint
constraints.description: 每个靶子被射中的概率为50%

constraints.name: expectation_calculation
constraints.description: 计算以不同点为父节点时的期望总分，并将这些期望总分相加
